name: a pawculiar situation
description:
(hi just a note that in the loading screen, please click on "load screen" as there is only one level atm! thanku)

You wake up feeling just the same as any other day. “They must’ve left the house again as usual…” you thought to yourself. Getting up on your paws, you reach out your limbs, getting in a good stretch before heading to get a sip of water. “Things look a little different today… Is it just me? Where is my water dish…” You walked around, steadily encountering more and more unfamiliar surroundings. “Wait a minute…”

You play as a cat that has seemingly shrunk ! The home that you once ruled over with an iron paw was now towering over you. 

Follow Ghibli as you navigate through the unfamiliar environment and re-experience what you thought you knew at the back of your paw.
